parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pay (penalty). Strengthened for a primary tio to pay a price, i.e. As a penalty.
Probably from deiknuo; right, i.e. Justice.
Ruin, doom, destruction, death. From a primary ollumi; ruin, i.e. Death, punishment.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Strength (absolutely), power, might, force, ability. From a derivative of is; forcefulness.
